files.content:
<script>import { Label as LabelPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
import { cn } from "$lib/utils.js";
let {
  ref = $bindable(null),
  class: className,
  ...restProps
} = $props();
</script>

<LabelPrimitive.Root
	bind:ref
	class={cn(
		"text-sm font-medium leading-none peer-disabled:cursor-not-allowed peer-disabled:opacity-70",
		className
	)}
	{...restProps}
/>
